headline: Fiserv Reveals Content Next to Strengthen Banks’ AI-Powered Content Management
summary: Fiserv, Inc. (NYSE:FI) is among the 10 Best Mobile Payments Stocks to Buy Now. Fiserv, Inc. (NYSE:FI) announced the release of Content Next, a cloud-based content management and workflow platform jointly developed with OpenText. The solution’s fundamental AI, automation, and smooth connectivity with Google Workspace and Microsoft 365 are intended to assist financial institutions in […]

headline: SumUp battles for small merchants
summary: The point-of-sale firm is investing in the U.S. to seize a larger share among small retailers as bigger payments players move upmarket.
